product_name: REI Sahara Bucket Hat - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: The REI Sahara Bucket Hat for infant and toddler boys stashes in a pack to be pulled out when extra sun protection is needed. Nylon fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection. Polyester sweatband wicks moisture. Chin strap is adjustable and has a breakaway design for added safety. The REI Sahara Bucket Hat for infant and toddler boys also has a brim with snap-up sides.
short_description: The REI Sahara Bucket Hat for infant and toddler boys stashes in a pack to be pulled out when extra sun protection is needed.
